questions.question: Pressure recovery in the case of orificemeter is _____________ that for venturimeter?
Coefficient of discharge for  orificemeter is
For an orifice meter,if you plot log( flow rate) vs log(pressure drop),the slope of the straight  line is

answers.a: ratio of actual flow rate to theoretical flow rate
answers.b: ratio of theoretical flow rate to actual flow rate
answers.c: ratio of velocity at the orifice or throat to the velocity at the pipe
answers.d: ratio of velocity at pipe to the velocity at the orifice or throat

questions.question: Two tubes of diameter 1 cm and 2 cm are filled with mercury to a height of 50 cm. The tubes are open to atmosphere. Now pressure at the bottom of the mercury column will be

answers.a: higher for the tube of dia 1 cm
answers.b: higher for the tube of dia 2 cm
answers.c: the same for both the tubes
